1273: Why there are so may Honkai creatures at once! What happened!
为什么忽然出现这么多崩坏生物！到底发生了什么！
どうして、急にこんなたくさんの崩壊生物が現れたんだ！一体、何が！？
왜 갑자기 이렇게 많은 붕괴생물이 나타난 거야! 대체, 뭐가!?
Why are there so many collapsed creatures all of a sudden! What the hell is going on!
How could so many disintegrating organisms suddenly appear! What in the world!
律者よ……律者が近くにいるの。
It's the Herrscher...the Herrscher is nearby.
It's the scribes. ...... scribes are nearby.
Damn, at a time like this!
I don't think she will let us go, she got us here and wanted to kill as all!
看来她是不会放过我们的，把我们引诱到这座学园都市就是想把我们一举消灭！
どうやら、彼女はブローニャたちを見逃すつもりがないようですね。この学園都市に誘い出したのも、まとめて消滅させるためだったのでしょう！
아무래도, 그녀는 브로냐들을 놓칠 생각이 없는 모양이네요. 이 학원 도시로 유인한 것도, 한꺼번에 소멸시키기 위해서였던 거겠죠!
It doesn't seem like she's going to let us go. The reason we were able to make it into Academy City must have been so she could annihilate us all at once!
It seems that she will not let us go and lured us to this school city to destroy us in one fell swoop!
Apparently, she has no intention of letting Bronya and the others go. I guess the reason she lured them to this school city was to annihilate them all together!
We're surrounded Honkai creatures, need to find a way ou!
我们已经被崩坏生物包围了，要想办法突围出去！
どうにかして、この囲みを突破しないと！
어떻게 해서든, 이 포위망을 돌파하지 않으면!
We've been surrounded by avalanche creatures, we need to find a way to break out!
We have to get through this enclosure somehow!
Emesa, take Seele and follow us, Kyushou you protect them, Himeko and me start attack!
埃米沙，你带着希儿跟紧我们，九霄负责保护她们，姬子和我一起突击！
エミザ、あなたはゼーレを連れてブローニャたちについて来てください。九霄は彼女たちを守ってください。姫子はブローニャと一緒に突撃です！
에미자, 당신은 제레를 데리고 브로냐들을 따라오세요. 큐쇼는 그녀들을 지켜주세요. 히메코는 브로냐와 함께 돌격입니다!
Emesa, you take Shire and follow us closely, Kyuushou is responsible for protecting them, and Jiuzi and I will assault together!
Emesa, you take Seele and follow Bronya. Kyuushou, protect them. Himeko, you are to charge with Bronya!
Huh, finally looks like what she used to be.
哼，总算有点以前的样子了。
フンッ、らしくなってきたじゃない。
Heck, it's always a bit like it used to be.
Well, it's starting to look like you.
德丽莎园长，后方就麻烦你了！
テレサ学園長、後方は任せました！
Director Theresa, I'll leave the back to you!
Teresa, Dean of Students, I've got the rear!
Theresa, why are you still here!
テレサ、何をボーッとしてるの！
Teresa, what are you dawdling about!
Wait! I have some one on my back!
你们慢点！我背着个人可是很重的啊！！
あんたたち、もう少しゆっくり走ってくれよ！こっちは人を背負ってんだからな！
너희들, 좀 더 천천히 달리라고! 여기 사람 업고 있다고!
You guys slow down! I'm carrying a very heavy person on my back!
You guys, you're gonna have to go a little slower than that! We're carrying people on our backs!
Bronya you're too anxious, don't cut off the team!
布洛妮娅你太着急了，不要让队伍脱节！
ブローニャ、焦りすぎよ。チームをバラけさせないで！
브로냐, 너무 조급해하지 마. 팀을 뿔뿔이 흩어지게 하지 말라고!
Bronya you're in too much of a hurry to get the team out of line!
Bronya, you're in too much of a hurry. Don't break up the team!
Seele is still in danger, I can't waste time here!
希儿还有生命危险，不能在这里浪费时间！
ゼーレの命は、今もなお危険なことに変わりありません。ですから、こんなところで時間を無駄にはできません！
제레의 목숨은 여전히 위험합니다. 그러니 이런 곳에서 시간을 낭비할 수 없어요!
Hill's life is still in danger, we can't waste time here!
Seele's life is still in danger. Therefore, we cannot waste our time here!
もうダメだ……本当に限界！
I can't...I really can't take it anymore!
I'm screwed ...... I'm really at my limit!
あたくしが交代するわ。
おい、待てって！あんたに背負えるのか！？
Wait a minute! You can carry it!
Hey, wait! You can't carry that!
呃！好厉害…居然一只手就把希儿给……
うおっ！すごい……片手でゼーレを……。
Ugh! So powerful...actually one hand to Hill ......
Theresa, are you okay with this!
Don't be little me, that's how I take her!
不要小看我，我就是这么带着她过来的！
バカにしないでよね。あたくしはこうやって彼女を連れて来たのよ！
바보 취급하지 마. 내가 이렇게 그녀를 데려왔잖아!
Don't underestimate me, that's how I brought her here!
Don't be ridiculous. This is how I brought her here!
Quick! We can't get out of here if the streets ahead are blocked!
抓紧时间！前面的街区被封锁的话我们就出不去了！
急いでください！この先のエリアが封鎖されたら出られなくなります！
서둘러주세요! 이 앞 구역이 봉쇄되면 나갈 수 없어요!
Hold on tight! We can't get out if the front block is blocked!
Please hurry! If the area ahead is blocked off, you won't be able to get out!
ふぅ……ふぅ……ゴホッ、ゴホッ！
エミザ！しっかりしなさい！ゴホッ！
Don't stop! Or you will be trapped!
不要停下脚步！不然会被包围的！
足を止めてはいけません！包囲されてしまいます！
발을 멈추면 안 됩니다! 포위당하고 말 것입니다!
Don't stop! Or you'll be surrounded!
Do not stop! You will be surrounded!
Bronya! This kid breathed too much Honkai energy, we can't leave her here!
布洛妮娅！这个孩子吸入了太多崩坏能身体已经支持不住了，我们不能抛下她！
ブローニャ！この子、崩壊エネルギーを吸い込みすぎて、身体がもたないわ。彼女を見捨てるわけにはいかないわよ！
브로냐! 이 아이, 붕괴 에너지를 너무 많이 흡입한 것 같아. 몸이 버티지 못할 거야. 그녀를 내버려 둘 순 없잖아요!
Bronya! She's inhaled too much Honkai energy, her body can't handle it. We can't just leave her behind!
Bronya! This child has inhaled too much avalanche energy to support her body, we can't leave her behind!
Bronya! She's sucking in so much disintegrating energy, her body can't take it. We can't just abandon her!
Damn! I need to take Seele back whatever happened!
可恶！无论如何我都要带希儿回去！
くっ！ブローニャは、何としてもゼーレを連れて帰ります！
쿱! 브로냐는 무슨 일이 있어도 제레를 데리고 돌아갈 거예요!
Damn it! I need to bring Seele back no matter what!
Damn it! I'm going to take Hsieh back no matter what!
Damn! Bronya will bring Seele back at any cost!
You are all going to end here!
今天你们都将葬身于此！
あなたたちは今日ここで死ぬのよ！
Today you will all be buried here!
Today you will all be buried here!
ゴホッ、ゴホッ、ゴホッ！皆、大丈夫！？
Cough cough cough! Is everything okay!
Gosh, gosh, gosh, gosh! Everybody okay!
Find a cover! Don't be attacked by the thunder!
快找掩体！不要被雷击打中！
早く遮蔽物を探して！雷に打たれないように！
빨리 엄폐물을 찾아! 번개에 맞지 않게!
Take cover! Don't get hit by the lightning strikes!
Take cover! Don't get hit by lightning strikes!
Quick, find a shield! Don't get struck by lightning!
律者……ついに来たのですね！
I won't let you go this time.
这次不会再让你们逃脱了。
今度は、あなたたちを逃がしたりしないわよ。
You won't be allowed to get away with it this time.
I won't let you guys get away this time.
必ず、あなたたちを始末してあげる！
I promise I will take care of you guys!
1274: ブローニャ！早く立って！
This is the end of the line.
ズドォオオオオオォンッ！
Huh, don't think you will be lucky this time!
哼，别以为这次还能侥幸挡下来！
フンッ、また運よく防げるなんて思わないことね！
훗, 또 운 좋게 막을 수 있을 거라 생각하지 마!
Hmph, don't think you can still get away with blocking it this time!
Hmph, don't think you can still get away with blocking it this time!
Hmph, don't think you'll be lucky enough to prevent it again!
Woo! I won't let you! Mei!
唔！我是不会退让的！芽衣！
うっ！あたくしは引き下がらないわよ！芽衣！
윽! 아타쿠시는 물러서지 않을 거야! 메이!
Ugh! I won't let you! Mei!
Well! I won't back down! Meiko!
Ugh! I'm not backing down! Mei!
I don't mind…anyway you will all become ashes.
无所谓…反正你们马上都会化为灰烬。
構わないわ……どちらにせよ、あなたたちは灰になるのだから。
상관없어...... 어차피 당신들은 재가 될 테니까.
It doesn't matter... Either way, you're all going to become ash.
It doesn't matter...you'll all be reduced to ashes soon anyway.
I don't care. ...... Either way, you guys will be ashes.
Why not fight back! If you don't plan to fight just give up now!
为什么不反击呢？既然不打算战斗的话干脆点放弃！
どうして反撃しないの？戦うつもりがないのなら、いさぎよく諦めなさい！
왜 반격하지 않는 거야? 싸울 생각이 없다면 차라리 포기하라구!
Why don't you fight back? If you have no intention of fighting, just give up!
Why not fight back? If you're not going to fight, just give up!
Why don't you fight back? If you're not going to fight, then give up, and fight with all your might!
This world is hopeless from the start, what you're chasing is just fake light.
这个世界从最初开始就不存在希望，你们不断追逐的只是虚假的光芒而已。
この世界には最初から希望なんて存在しないのよ。あなたたちが追い求めていたのは偽りの光にすぎないの。
이 세상에는 처음부터 희망 같은 건 존재하지 않아. 너희들이 추구하던 건 거짓된 빛에 불과했을 뿐이야.
This world was forsaken from the beginning. All you were looking for was a false light.
There is no hope in this world from the beginning, and what you keep chasing is just a false light.
There has been no hope in this world from the beginning. It is only a false light that you have been chasing.
No matter how many times I repeat it's the same, your death is doomed!
不管重复多少次都是一样，你们的死亡是无法改变的事实！
何回繰り返しても同じよ。あなたたちの死は変えようのない事実なの！
몇 번을 반복해도 똑같아. 너희들의 죽음은 바꿀 수 없는 사실이야!
It's the same no matter how many times you repeat it. Your death is an unchangeable fate!
No matter how many times it is repeated, your death is an unchangeable fact!
It doesn't matter how many times I repeat it. Your deaths are an unchangeable fact!
ズドォオオオオオォンッ！！
ブローニャたちを連れて逃げて！
Take Bronya and the girls and go!
Take Bronya and the others and run!
No! You won't have any chance to win on your own!
不行！你一个人是没有胜算的！
ダメよ！あなた1人じゃ勝ち目なんてないわ！
안 돼! 너 혼자서는 이길 수 없어!
No way! You have no chance to win alone!
No, you can't! You don't stand a chance on your own!
But we will all die if this continues! Take them go! Now it's only you that can protect them!
这样下去我们都会死！带着她们走！现在能保护她们的只有你了！
このままじゃ、どちらにせよ全滅よ！彼女たちを連れて逃げなさい！今、彼女たちを守れるのはあなただけなのよ！
이대로면 어차피 전멸이야! 그녀들을 데리고 도망치세요! 지금 그녀들을 지킬 수 있는 건 당신뿐이에요!
We're all going to die if this keeps up! Get them out of here! You're the only one who can protect them now!
We'll all die if this goes on! Take them away! You're the only one who can protect them now!
We're gonna get wiped out one way or another! Get them out of here! You are the only one who can protect them now!
That's all I can do now! Don't forget what you promise me! Protect those kids!
我现在能做到也只有这些了！不要忘了你答应我的事情！带着那些孩子活下去！
私にできることはこれだけなの！私と約束したことを忘れないで！あの子たちを連れて生きるのよ！
내가 할 수 있는 건 이게 다야! 나와 약속한 걸 잊지 말아줘! 그 아이들을 데리고 살아가는 거야!
That's all I can do now! Don't forget what you promised me! Take those children and live!
It's the only thing I can do! Remember what you promised me! Take those children and live!
……这种无聊的觉悟我已经听够了！
……そんなつまらない覚悟、聞き飽きたわ！
.....I've heard enough of your boring convictions!
...... I've heard enough of this boring awakening!
...... I'm so tired of hearing that boring resolve!
Himeko! Stop! Let's die together! I won't be afraid!
姬子！别耍帅了！要死就一起死！我才不会怕！
姫子！何、格好つけてんだよ！死ぬ時は一緒だ！恐怖なんて微塵も感じない！
히메코! 뭐, 멋 부리는 거야! 죽을 때는 함께야! 공포 같은 건 조금도 느끼지 않아!
Himeko! Don't be handsome! If you want to die, let's die together! I won't be afraid!
Himeko! What are you all dressed up for? We're all going to die together! I don't feel the slightest fear!
Bronya! Don't you want to save Seele! Then don't hesitate! Go!
布洛妮娅！你不是要救希儿么！那就不要犹豫！给我走！
ブローニャ！あなたはゼーレを助けたいんでしょ！だったら迷わないで！逃げなさい！
브로냐! 당신은 제레를 구하고 싶은 거잖아! 그럼 망설이지 말고! 도망쳐!
Bronya! Don't you want to save Hill! Then don't hesitate! Get out of here!
Bronya! You want to help Seele! Then don't hesitate! Run!
Theresa, give me Seele, you take Emesa……
德丽莎，把希儿给我，你背着埃米沙……
テレサ、ゼーレをブローニャに。あなたはエミザを背負ってください……。
테레사, 제레를 브로냐에게. 당신은 에미자를 업어주세요…….
Theresa, give me Seele. You can carry Emesa on your back.
Theresa, give me Hill while you carry Emesa ......
Teresa, Seele to Bronya. You should carry Emesa on your back. ......
おいっ、何言ってんだブローニャ！
Hey, what are you talking about, Bronya!
Hey! Leave me alone! Leave me alone! Himeko! Himeko!
喂！放开我！放开我！姬子！姬子！！
おいっ！放せ！姫子！姫子ッーーーー！！
Hey! Let go of me! Himeko! Himeko!!!
Hey! Let go of me! Let go of me! Himeko! Himeko!!!
Hey! Let go of me! Himeko! Himeko!
九霄……あなたも早く行きなさい。
Kyuushou... Hurry up and get out of here, too.
彼女たちのことは頼んだわよ。
Those girls are all counting on you.
I asked you to take care of these girls.
1275: 怎么了…已经撑不住了么？
どうしたの……もう限界なの？
What's wrong ...... are you at your limit already?
What's wrong ...... are you at your limit already?
I thought you try to stop me, to give them more time, this ending way would be meaningless.
你不是要拖住我，给她们争取时间么，这个样子就结束的话就没有意义了。
あなたは私の足止めをして、彼女たちの時間を稼ぐんでしょ？こんな簡単に終わってしまっては意味がないわよ。
넌 내 발을 묶어두고, 그녀들의 시간을 벌어주는 거잖아? 이렇게 쉽게 끝나버리면 의미 없잖아.
You're stalling me and earning their time, right?  It doesn't make sense to give up so easily.
Don't you want to stall me and buy them time? There's no point in ending it this way.
You're going to stall me and buy these girls some time, right? It wouldn't make sense for it to be over this easily.
Ha…really get stronger…with the power of Herrscher, your heart become as hard as stone as well, you were so soft before, but now beomes so cold.
咳咳…还真是变得强大了呢…拥有了律者的力量，连内心都变的如同石头一样坚硬，没想到曾经那样温柔的你，也会有如此冷酷的时候。
ゴホッ、ゴホッ……本当に強くなったわね……律者の力を手に入れて、内心まで石のように硬くなっているわ。かつてのあの優しいあなたでも、こんなに冷酷になれるとはね。
콜록, 콜록...... 정말 강해졌네......율자의 힘을 손에 넣고, 마음까지 돌처럼 단단해졌구나. 예전의 그 다정한 당신도 이렇게 냉혹해질 수 있을 줄이야.
Hahaha ... You've really become stronger ... You've obtained the power of the Herrscher, and it's hardened your heart to stone.  Even you, who used to be kind, can be so ruthless.
You've become really strong... With the power of the Herrscher, even your heart has become as hard as stone... I never thought that you, who was once so gentle, would be so cold at times.

Gosh, gosh,...... you really have become so strong, you've gained the power of the ...... law, and even your insides are as hard as stone. I didn't realize that even that gentle you once were could be so ruthless.
That's all you want to say……
想说的话就只有这些么……
言いたいことは、それだけかしら……。
Is that all you have to say....?
Is that all you want to say ......
I guess that's all I'm trying to say. ......
I would like to talk more, but it's a shame…there's no wine here……
我倒是想和你再多叙叙旧，不过可惜了…这里现在连一瓶像样的酒都找不到……
本当は積もる話の一つや二つ、あなたとしたかったけど……残念ね、ここじゃお酒が見つかりやしない。
사실은 쌓인 이야기 한두 가지 당신과 나누고 싶었지만......아쉽네요, 여긴 술이 있을 리 없으니.
I would like to catch up with you more, but unfortunately ... here now can not even find a decent bottle of wine ......
I really wanted to tell you a story or two, but ...... too bad I can't find any booze here.
Still want to fight like this?
这样的身体还想继续战斗么。
そんな身体で、まだ戦い続けるつもり？
Are you still going to fight me when your body is about to give up?
Do you want to continue fighting with such a body.
Are you still going to fight with a body like that?
Yes…I have nothing else to do.
是啊…除了战斗我什么也没有剩下了。
そうよ……戦うこと以外、私には何も残されていないから。
그래요......싸우는 것 말고는 내게 남은 게 없으니까.
Yeah... I have nothing left to do except to fight.
Yeah...there's nothing left for me but to fight.
Yes ...... because there is nothing left for me to do but fight.
Eh! At least you can save the reputation in the end……
咳咳！至少在最后不能晚节不保啊……
ゴホッ、ゴホッ！少なくとも、最後の最後で己の生き様を汚すわけにはいかないわ……。
콜록, 콜록! 적어도 마지막 순간에 자신의 삶의 방식을 더럽힐 순 없으니까.......
(Cough, cough!) At least I'll be able to go out fighting for what I've believed in...
Ahem! At least at the end can not be late ah ......
Gosh, gosh! At least I can't tarnish my way of life at the end of the day. ......
Huh! Enough…let's go on! I haven't got such a great fight!
呼！休息够了…继续吧！好久没有这么痛快地打一架了！
ふぅ！休憩はここまで……続けるわよ！こんな痛快な戦いは久しぶりだわ！
후휴! 휴식은 여기까지......계속할 거예요! 이런 통쾌한 싸움은 오랜만이네요!
Ha! Break time's over... Let's get on with it! I haven't fought this hard in a long time!
Whew! Enough rest...let's get on with it! It's been a long time since I've had such a good fight!
Whew! So much for the break, we'll continue on ......! I haven't seen a fight this painful in a long time!
I have no time for you, the next punch will be the final one.
